quote:
If nobody hates you,
you're doing something wrong.

altText: A photo of Baelish of Game of Thrones.
quote:
Money buys a man's silence for a time.
A bolt in the heart buys it forever.

When I'm sad I stop being sad
and be AWESOME instead.

Try not.
DO or do NOT,
There is no try.

altText: Tyrion's photo of Game of Thrones
quote:
That's what I do.
I drink and
I know things.

I'm not crazy!
My mother had me tested.

If you talk to GOD youre religious.
If GOD talks to you, youre psychotic.
